data.name: パズルハムスター ～地球冒険記～ Demo
data.detailed_description:
match3 puzzle action game！
Press the block. Climb the block. Erase the block. Let's aim for the goal!
Simple puzzle game！

■rule
Flag is the goal.
Match 3 or more of the same colored blocks.
The block cannot be pulled.
Only one can be pressed.
Can climb one step.

There are 50 stages in the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
